Method Detail

getForum

public Forum[] getForum()
                 throws TapatalkApiException
Return full forum in a nested tree structure. In API Level 3 no parameter required for this function and the sub-forum description. For Level 4, forum description is omitted unless "return_description" is set to true

Returns:
Throws:
TapatalkApiException

getForum

public Forum[] getForum(boolean returnDescription,
                        String forumId)
                 throws TapatalkApiException
Return full forum in a nested tree structure. In API Level 3 no parameter required for this function and the sub-forum description. For Level 4, forum description is omitted unless "return_description" is set to true

forumId -

loginForum

public void loginForum(String forumId,
                       String password)
                throws TapatalkApiException
Allows mobile client to access password protected sub-forum. It currently support only sub-forum at leaf level. If the password is valid, also return the updated cookies so the client will have access to the subsequent get_topic calls

Parameters:
forumId -
password -
Throws:
TapatalkApiException

getIdByUrl

public String[] getIdByUrl(String url)
                    throws TapatalkApiException
This new function is used to extract topic / post ID from a URL so an internal link can be open in app. Especially in SEO environment it is impossible for the app to detect the IDs from URL and hence requires server-side assistance. This function is used in conjunction with get_config that returns get_id_by_url = 1.

Parameters:
url -
Returns:
Throws:
TapatalkApiException
